data.name: Soluble Reactive Phosphorus
data.description: Measure of phosphate in filtered water sample.

data.name: Nitrate+nitrite-nitrogen
data.description: Nitrate and nitrite in filtered water sample.

data.name: Total Phosphorus
data.description: All inorganic and organic phosphorus in whole water sample.

data.name: Total Nitrogen
data.description: All inorganic and organic nitrogen in whole water sample.

data.name: Chloride
data.description: Chloride content of filtered water sample.

data.name: Algal Biomass (Chlorophyll a)
data.description: Estimate of algal growth on the stream bottom.

data.name: Thin Biofilm Cover
data.description: Percent of rock coverage by slimy but not visible algal accumulation.

data.name: Moderately Thick Diatom Cover
data.description: Percent of rock coverage by golden brown diatom mat <5 mm thick.

data.name: Thick Diatom Cover
data.description: Percent of rock coverage by golden brown diatom mat >5 mm thick.

data.name: Phormidium Cover
data.description: Percent of rock coverage by cyanobacterium, Phormidium sp.

data.name: Ulothrix Cover
data.description: Percent of rock coverage by green alga, Ulothrix sp.

data.name: Oedogonium Cover
data.description: Percent of rock coverage by green alga, Oedogonium sp.

data.name: Hydrurus Cover
data.description: Percent of rock coverage by Chrysophyte, Hydrurus foetidus.

data.name: Gross Primary Productivity
data.description: Total photosynthesis by algae and other plants in the immediate upstream research.  Estimated from changes in dissolved oxygen, photosynthetically active radiation, barometric pressure, depth and water temperature.

data.name: Ecosystem Respiration
data.description: Total respiration of all organisms in the immediate upstream research.  Estimated from changes in dissolved oxygen, photosynthetically active radiation, barometric pressure, depth and water temperature.
